description: Linear regression model that is robust to outliers.

param.name: epsilon
param.description: The parameter epsilon controls the number of samples that should be classified as outliers. The smaller the epsilon, the more robust it is to outliers.

param.name: max_iter
param.description: Maximum number of iterations that scipy.optimize.fmin_l_bfgs_b should run for.

param.name: warm_start
param.description: This is useful if the stored attributes of a previously used model has to be reused. If set to False, then the coefficients will be rewritten for every call to fit.

param.name: fit_intercept
param.description: Whether or not to fit the intercept. This can be set to False if the data is already centered around the origin.
